ygData.subject: RE: Bard Handicap of Sorts
ygData.msgSnippet: Was probably a spectre, they wander over from Spectre Isle occasionally and I ve had to outrun them a few times.  Skeletons sink like stones. Kit ... From: Ken
ygData.messageBody:
Was probably a spectre, they wander over from Spectre Isle occasionally and
I've had to outrun them a few times. Skeletons sink like stones.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 1:39 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Handicap of Sorts


From: Ken Bachman <kbachman@...>

[I wrote]:

> Before I even got Underwater Breathing song, I died in the Ocean of
> Tears to a Specter onslaught ...

I have Specters on the brain. I think it was some kind of skeleton, in
retrospect. What I mostly remember is dying quickly, and being really
irritated that they could run on water... hehe

Kenross Cantoforjado, 35 songs, Innoruuk

with the subject submissions.
